pr_title: Map unmapped fields that have getter methods

timeline.message: Map unmapped fields that have getter methods

timeline.bodyText: also is this field static final? I know there is a few places where getters exist for static final fields (advancements)
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: None of the fields I mapped were static or final.
replies.author: haykam821
liach

timeline.bodyText: Doubt it, filtering crafterable has been generalized.
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Definitely, this should be getRecipeBookOptions and recipeBookOptions now, but I was mainly focused on making the fields consistent with the getter methods.
replies.author: haykam821

replies.bodyText: Should be fixed. We shouldn't introduce wrong names.
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: Not sure about this, it's an optional memory codec. The getter and the constructor param are wrong as well, probably a matcher issue
timeline.author: YanisBft
YanisBft

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	FIELD field_24676 particleType Lnet/minecraft/class_2394;
          
          
            
            	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_2394;F)V
          
          
            
            		ARG 1 particleType
          
          
            
            	FIELD field_24676 particle Lnet/minecraft/class_2394;
          
          
            
            	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_2394;F)V
          
          
            
            		ARG 1 particle
          
      
    
    
  

returns a particle effect (with the getter por favor)
timeline.author: YanisBft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,5 +1,8 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_4761 net/minecraft/world/biome/BiomeParticleConfig
 	FIELD field_22035 chance F
 	FIELD field_24675 CODEC Lcom/mojang/serialization/Codec;
+	FIELD field_24676 particleType Lnet/minecraft/class_2394;
+	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_2394;F)V
+		ARG 1 particleType

timeline.message:
Fix the parts field in GhastEntityModel using the same name as its getter method

Co-authored-by: liach <7806504+liach@users.noreply.github.com>
